name: Transhumance
description:
Type of game
Adventure

Description
In Transhumance, you play as the guardian of an old and mysterious animal race, the Khoris. Your goal is to lead them into a fantastic journey, using the power of your voice.

Platform + type of controller
Windows, Xbox Controller + Microphone

How to play
Left stick to move
Right stick to move the camera
Right trigger to activate the microphone
Start to view instructions

The creators
Game design : Kamil Nahouri, Clémentine Plissonnier
Art : Lucas Terryn, Yannig le Guern
Sound Design : Damien Pochat-Cottilloux
Programming : Florian "Eiyeron" Dormont
